name: INSendMessageIntent
desc: A request to send a message to the designated recipients.

items.name: init(recipients: [INPerson]?, outgoingMessageType: INOutgoingMessageType, content: String?, speakableGroupName: INSpeakableString?, conversationIdentifier: String?, serviceName: String?, sender: INPerson?, attachments: [INSendMessageAttachment]?)
items.desc: Creates a send message intent object with the specified content and recipients.

items.name: var recipients: [INPerson]?
items.desc: The array of users to receive the message.

items.name: var outgoingMessageType: INOutgoingMessageType
items.desc: The format of the message contents.

items.name: var speakableGroupName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of the group to receive the message.

items.name: var serviceName: String?
items.desc: The service to use when sending the message.

items.name: var sender: INPerson?
items.desc: The person or account thatâ€™s sending the message.

items.name: var attachments: [INSendMessageAttachment]?
items.desc: Audio files to include in the message.
